Fix form accessibility issues

  1. X-GOVUK projects

Find out how to fix common accessibility mistakes in forms

Even when you design using the accessibility-focused GOV.UK Frontend (as documented in the GOV.UK Design System), there are several pitfalls that can create accessibility issues.

Design

  • Avoid tabs for complex content
  • Make sure that answers are connected to a question
  • Accordions create extra work
  • On text pages, avoid headings that are questions

Code implementation

  • Do not code lists as tables
  • Links in hint text confuse screen readers
  • Don't forget autocomplete labels

Support links

  • Accessibility statement
  • Cookies
  • Sitemap
